content.text:
# List of State Register of Heritage Places in the City of Melville

The State Register of Heritage Places is maintained by the Heritage Council of Western Australia. , 172 places are heritage-listed in the City of Melville, of which 24 are on the State Register of Heritage Places.
List
The Western Australian State Register of Heritage Places, , lists the following 24 state registered places within the City of Melville:
